story-moment.THE ORB: Star-Lord acquired knowledge of a valuable item called the Orb, but also acquired the interest of the Kree warrior Ronan, who wanted the Orb for his lord, the dreaded Thanos.
story-moment.ESCAPE FROM PRISION: Arrested by the Nova Corps and unceremoniously thrown into prison, Star-Lord gained the partnership of Gamora, Rocket, Groot, and Drax, and together the little band escaped from incarceration and made their way to the far-off place called Knowhere.
story-moment.POWER STONE: In accessing the Power Stone's power for himself, Star-Lord drew strength from a vision of his late mother and also from his team and together they defeated Ronan and saved the galaxy.
story-moment.NEW CELESTIAL ABILITIES: At first reveling in his new Celestial abilities, Star-Lord turned on his father once he learned Ego killed his mother and planned on terraforming countless worlds in his own image with Quill’s added power.
story-moment.FIGHTING THANOS: Star-Lord devises a plan for the Guardians, along with Iron Man, Doctor Strange, and Spider-Man, to stop Thanos from gaining Strange’s Infinity Stone.

powers+abilities.HALF CELESTIAL: Half Celestial and half human, Peter Quill has superhuman abilities, allowing him to physically withstand the exposure of the Power Stone without dying.
powers+abilities.ENERGY MANIPULATION: Due to his parentage, Star-Lord is able to manipulate energy and matter.
powers+abilities.SKILLED THIEF: As a result of being raised among Ravagers, Star-Lord picked up their skills of the trade—thievery and evasion.
powers+abilities.ACCOMPLISHED PILOT: Star-Lord is an accomplished pilot of the Milano.
powers+abilities.COMBAT: Plucky and resourceful, Star-Lord is highly-skilled at hand-to-hand combat as well as an expert marksman with his two Quad Blasters.
